The three people found in the world [an3: A person who you should be disgusted by, and you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend them.
A person you should regard with equanimity, and you shouldn’t associate with, accompany, or attend them.
A person you should associate with, accompany, and attend.
The qualities of a person you should be: No true ascetic or spiritual practitioner—though claiming to be one
The qualities of a person you should reg: Even when lightly criticized they lose their temper, becoming annoyed, hostile, and hard-hearted, and they display annoyance, hate, and bitterness.
